name: alloxtract
description: Extract glibc malloc structs to JSON

scripts.build: jison -I -o parsers/struct-types.js grammars/struct-types.jison && jison -I -o parsers/c11.js grammars/c11.jison && jison -I -o parsers/typedefs.js grammars/typedefs.jison && jison -I -o parsers/defines.js grammars/defines.jison && jison -I -o parsers/gettypedefs.js grammars/gettypedefs.jison
scripts.build-dbg: jison -x -I -n structTypes -o parsers/struct-types.js grammars/struct-types.jison && jison -x -I -n c11 -o parsers/c11.js grammars/c11.jison && jison -x -I -n typedefs -o parsers/typedefs.js grammars/typedefs.jison && jison -x -I -o parsers/defines.js grammars/defines.jison && jison -x -I -o parsers/gettypedefs.js grammars/gettypedefs.jison

author: Rowan Hart
